Class.Name: NSImage
Class.Description: A high-level interface for manipulating image data.

InstanceMethods.Name: setName:
InstanceMethods.Description: Registers the image object under the specified name.

InstanceMethods.Name: name
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the name associated with the image, if any.

InstanceMethods.Name: initByReferencingFile:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes and returns an image object using the specified file.

InstanceMethods.Name: initByReferencingURL:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes and returns an image object using the specified URL.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithContentsOfFile:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes and returns an image object with the contents of the specified file.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithContentsOfURL:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes and returns an image object with the contents of the specified URL.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithData:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes and returns an image object using the provided image data.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithDataIgnoringOrientation:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes and returns an image object using the provided image data and ignoring the EXIF orientation tags.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithCGImage:size:
InstanceMethods.Description: Creates a new image using the contents of the provided image.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithPasteboard:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes and returns an image object with data from the specified pasteboard.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithCoder:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes and returns an image object from data in an unarchiver.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithIconRef:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes the image object with a Carbon-style icon resource.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithSize:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes and returns an image object with the specified dimensions.

InstanceMethods.Name: configurationByApplyingConfiguration:
InstanceMethods.Description: Creates a configuration object by applying the values from the configuration you specify.

InstanceMethods.Name: imageWithSymbolConfiguration:
InstanceMethods.Description: Creates a new symbol image with the specified configuration.

InstanceMethods.Name: isTemplate
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the image is a template image.

InstanceMethods.Name: addRepresentation:
InstanceMethods.Description: Adds the specified image representation object to the image.

InstanceMethods.Name: addRepresentations:
InstanceMethods.Description: Adds an array of image representation objects to the image.

InstanceMethods.Name: removeRepresentation:
InstanceMethods.Description: Removes and releases the specified image representation.

InstanceMethods.Name: bestRepresentationForRect:context:hints:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the best representation of the image for the specified rectangle using the provided hints.

InstanceMethods.Name: drawInRect:
InstanceMethods.Description: Draws the image in the specified rectangle.

InstanceMethods.Name: drawAtPoint:fromRect:operation:fraction:
InstanceMethods.Description: Draws all or part of the image at the specified point in the current coordinate system.

InstanceMethods.Name: drawInRect:fromRect:operation:fraction:
InstanceMethods.Description: Draws all or part of the image in the specified rectangle in the current coordinate system.

InstanceMethods.Name: drawInRect:fromRect:operation:fraction:respectFlipped:hints:
InstanceMethods.Description: Draws all or part of the image in the specified rectangle respecting the hints and the orientation of the current coordinate system.

InstanceMethods.Name: drawRepresentation:inRect:
InstanceMethods.Description: Draws the image using the specified image representation object.

InstanceMethods.Name: lockFocus
InstanceMethods.Description: Prepares the image to receive drawing commands.

InstanceMethods.Name: lockFocusFlipped:
InstanceMethods.Description: Prepares the image to receive drawing commands using the specified flipped state.

InstanceMethods.Name: unlockFocus
InstanceMethods.Description: Removes the focus from the image.

InstanceMethods.Name: recache
InstanceMethods.Description: Invalidates and frees offscreen caches of all image representations.

InstanceMethods.Name: TIFFRepresentationUsingCompression:factor:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a data object that contains TIFF data with the specified compression settings for all of the image representations in the image.

InstanceMethods.Name: CGImageForProposedRect:context:hints:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a Core Graphics image based on the contents of the current image object.

InstanceMethods.Name: cancelIncrementalLoad
InstanceMethods.Description: Cancels the current download operation, if any, for an incrementally loaded image.

InstanceMethods.Name: hitTestRect:withImageDestinationRect:context:hints:flipped:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns whether the destination rectangle would intersect a non-transparent portion of the image.

InstanceMethods.Name: layerContentsForContentsScale:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns an object that may be used as the contents of a layer.

InstanceMethods.Name: recommendedLayerContentsScale:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the recommended layer contents scale for this image.

InstanceMethods.Name: lockFocusOnRepresentation:
InstanceMethods.Description: Prepares the specified image representation to receive drawing commands.

InstanceMethods.Name: bestRepresentationForDevice:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the best representation for the device with the specified characteristics.

InstanceMethods.Name: compositeToPoint:operation:
InstanceMethods.Description: Composites the entire image to the specified point in the current coordinate system.

InstanceMethods.Name: compositeToPoint:fromRect:operation:
InstanceMethods.Description: Composites a portion of the image to the specified point in the current coordinate system.

InstanceMethods.Name: compositeToPoint:fromRect:operation:fraction:
InstanceMethods.Description: Composites a portion of the image at the specified opacity to the current coordinate system.

InstanceMethods.Name: compositeToPoint:operation:fraction:
InstanceMethods.Description: Composites the entire image at the specified opacity in the current coordinate system.

InstanceMethods.Name: dissolveToPoint:fraction:
InstanceMethods.Description: Composites the entire image to the specified location using the source-over operator.

InstanceMethods.Name: dissolveToPoint:fromRect:fraction:
InstanceMethods.Description: Composites a portion of the image to the specified location using the source-over operator.

InstanceMethods.Name: setScalesWhenResized:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets whether to scale different-sized image representations to fit the image's size.

InstanceMethods.Name: scalesWhenResized
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether to scale image representations to fit the image's size.

InstanceMethods.Name: setDataRetained:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets whether the image retains its source image data.

InstanceMethods.Name: isDataRetained
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a Boolean value that incidates whether the image retains its source image data.

InstanceMethods.Name: setCachedSeparately:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets whether each image representation uses a separate offscreen window to cache its contents.

InstanceMethods.Name: isCachedSeparately
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether each image representation caches its contents in a separate offscreen window.

InstanceMethods.Name: setCacheDepthMatchesImageDepth:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets whether the image’s offscreen window caches use the same bit depth as the image data itself.

InstanceMethods.Name: cacheDepthMatchesImageDepth
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether an image's offscreen window caches use the same bit depth as the image data itself.

InstanceMethods.Name: setFlipped:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets whether the polarity of the y axis is inverted when drawing an image.

InstanceMethods.Name: isFlipped
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the image uses a flipped coordinate system.

InstanceProperties.Name: symbolConfiguration
InstanceProperties.Description: The configuration details for a symbol image.

InstanceProperties.Name: template
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that determines whether the image represents a template image.

InstanceProperties.Name: representations
InstanceProperties.Description: An array containing all of the image object’s image representations.

InstanceProperties.Name: prefersColorMatch
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the image prefers to choose image representations using color-matching or resolution-matching.

InstanceProperties.Name: usesEPSOnResolutionMismatch
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether EPS representations are preferred when no other representations match the resolution of the device.

InstanceProperties.Name: matchesOnMultipleResolution
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether image representations whose resolution is an integral multiple of the device resolution are a match.

InstanceProperties.Name: valid
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether it is possible to draw an image representation.

InstanceProperties.Name: backgroundColor
InstanceProperties.Description: The background color for the image.

InstanceProperties.Name: capInsets
InstanceProperties.Description: The cap insets for the image.

InstanceProperties.Name: resizingMode
InstanceProperties.Description: The resizing mode for the image.

InstanceProperties.Name: alignmentRect
InstanceProperties.Description: A rectangle that you can use to position the image during layout.

InstanceProperties.Name: TIFFRepresentation
InstanceProperties.Description: A data object containing TIFF data for all of the image representations in the image.

InstanceProperties.Name: matchesOnlyOnBestFittingAxis
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the image matches only on the best fitting axis.

TypeMethods.Name: imageNamed:
TypeMethods.Description: Returns the image object associated with the specified name.

TypeMethods.Name: imageWithSystemSymbolName:accessibilityDescription:
TypeMethods.Description: Creates a symbol image with the system symbol name and accessibility description that you specify.

TypeMethods.Name: imageWithSize:flipped:drawingHandler:
TypeMethods.Description: Creates and returns an image object whose contents are drawn using the specified block.

TypeMethods.Name: canInitWithPasteboard:
TypeMethods.Description: Tests whether the image can create an instance of itself using pasteboard data.

TypeMethods.Name: imageFileTypes
TypeMethods.Description: Returns an array of strings identifying the image types supported by the registered image representation objects.

TypeMethods.Name: imageUnfilteredFileTypes
TypeMethods.Description: Returns an array of strings identifying the file types supported directly by the registered image representation objects.

TypeMethods.Name: imagePasteboardTypes
TypeMethods.Description: Returns an array of strings identifying the pasteboard types supported directly by the registered image representation objects.

TypeMethods.Name: imageUnfilteredPasteboardTypes
TypeMethods.Description: Returns an array of strings identifying the pasteboard types supported directly by the registered image representation objects.

TypeProperties.Name: imageTypes
TypeProperties.Description: Returns an array of UTI strings identifying the image types supported by the registered image representation objects, either directly or through a user-installed filter service.

TypeProperties.Name: imageUnfilteredTypes
TypeProperties.Description: Returns an array of UTI strings identifying the image types supported directly by the registered image representation objects.
